product_name: Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 Smoke Lens Swim Mask
long_description: The Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 Smoke Lens Swim Mask provides great visibility to help you sight your line, whether you're doing laps in the pool or competing in an open-water race. Durable resin lenses have an antifog and scratch-resistant coating; lenses provide 100% UVA and UVB protection. Leak-resistant silicone skirt around the lenses distributes pressure and prevents water from getting in; skirt provides extra coverage to keep cold water off your face. Lenses provide 180deg of visibility; smoke-tinted lenses keep the sun out of your eyes when you're training outdoors. Silicone strap endures regular use. The Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 swim mask includes a hard plastic case.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Seal 2.0 Smoke Lens Swim Mask provides great visibility to help you sight your line, whether you're doing laps in the pool or competing in an open-water race.
